title: Can you really survive on Mars? What science fiction gets wrong about off-world living
description: Arnie said, "Get your ass to Mars", but is it really a good idea? We asked the experts about our Martian future.
content: Arnie said, "Get your ass to Mars", but is it really a good idea? We asked the experts about our Martian future.
